result.execSummary:
The defendant Dennis George Lemke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Court orders restitution to be collected by DOC for up to 25% of prison funds and wages.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Defendant Dennis George Lemke in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Defendant Dennis George Lemke in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel received PSI, no corrections noted. Victim statement of R.R.  State notes PSI well written.  State recommends 7 1/2 yrs of initial confinement with 5 yrs. extended supervision; restitution of $1108.00; 91 days sentence credit.  Atty Waters suggests 2 1/2 yrs. initial confinement, 5 yrs. extended supervision consecutive to current prison sentence serving.  Defendant addresses the court.  Court sentences defendant to 10 yrs. in WI State Prison sytem; 5 yrs. initial confinement, 5 yrs. extended supervision concurrent with Pierce County Case No. 03CF59; find defendant eligible for substance abuse program; not eligible for challenge incarceration program; conditions of ES:  Pay restitution of $1108 ($500 to P.R.; $608 to R.R.) and order to be collected by DOC from up to 25% of prison funds and wages; waive costs; credit for 91 days; advised of felony prohibitions, appeal rights.
Restitution Information
Sentencing hearing at 07-21-2015 03:00 pm
Sentencing hearing at 07-07-2015 03:00 pm
Paper Information filed with cross-outs.  Original Information from DA through Interface rec'd 5/8/15 without the modifier.

Information (paper copy filed with the court with changes)
Waiver form

Court advises defendant of charge on Information/max penalties/rights.  Defendant pleads no contest.  Court finds defendant's waiver of constitutional rights and plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty.  PSI ordered.  Counsel to schedule sentencing hearing @ 60 days out.

Defendant Dennis George Lemke in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Waters received Information without repeater, waives reading, notes defendant Waiver right to Preliminary Hrg. and files form with the court.  Court finds defendant knowingly & voluntarily waives preliminary hearing and binds defendant over.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Dennis George Lemke in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Defendant Dennis George Lemke in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Judge advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights including right to Prelim. Hrg.  State requests $5000 cash bond.  Court sets $5000 cash bond.  Defendant waives time limits for P.H.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
